pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Used by Supana Kurogane$(br2)Use $(l:gotchard/items/blank_ride_chemy_card)Blank Ride Chemy Cards$(/l) and an $(l:gotchard/items/alchemist_rings)Alchemist Ring$(/l) inside to obtain Chemy Cards$(li)Blue: Vehicle$(li)Green: Job$(li)Red: Ancient$(li)Purple: Occult$(li)Orange: Cosmic
Use in the Nether to obtain Daybreak Chemy Cards$(br2)Use in the City dimension to obtain the $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#legend_ride_chemy_card)Legend Chemy Card$(/l)
